alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:05PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Slow-moving thunderstorms will impact portions of Warren, Henderson, northern McDonough, northeastern Hancock, southeastern Des Moines and northeastern Lee Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 304 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking slow-moving thunderstorms along a line extending from near Knoxville to Burlington. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stronghurst, La Harpe, Terre Haute, Raritan and Disco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
